boost::logging::op_equal::same_type_op_equal

Implements operator==, which compares two objects. If they have the same type, it will compare them using the type's member operator==. More...

List of all members.

Detailed Description

template<class type>
struct boost::logging::op_equal::same_type_op_equal< type >

Implements operator==, which compares two objects. If they have the same type, it will compare them using the type's member operator==.

The only constraint is that operator== must be a *member* function
